Description:
312356213 - PJC/15032022/1 - There are open edges around the site that do not have suitable edge protection to prevent falls. You have failed to take suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, any person falling a distance liable to cause serious personal injury.

312356266 - PJC/15032022/2 - The ground is at risk of collapse which would crush any workers in the area and is liable to cause serious personal injury. You have failed to take all practicable steps to prevent danger to any person, including where necessary, the provision of supports or battering to ensure excavation does not collapse.

312356314 - IJC/16032022/1 - You failed to ensure that work at height under your control at the construction site at the above site, was properly planned, appropriately supervised and carried out, so far as is reasonably practicable, safely.

312356339 - IJC/16032022/3 - You have failed in your role as principal contractor to plan, manage and monitor construction work carried out either by you or by workers under your control, to ensure that, so far as is reasonably practicable, it is carried out without risks to health and safety.

312356351 - IJC/16032022/2 - You have failed in your role as principal contractor to keep, so far as is reasonably practicable, each part of a construction site in good order and in those parts in which construction work is being carried out, in a reasonable state of cleanliness.
